thread.title: Edward O"Connor
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Edward O"Connor

author: Edward O"Connor
title: Edward O"Connor
text: I have purchased Tires from Town Fair tire since the 1980's. I have also owned well over 100 motor vehicles and almost exclusively purchase all of my tires from Town Fair. I've even had Neil Mellon involved on a couple of exotic car installations as they worked to accommodate my needs. Every time Town Fair has done an incredible job. They are competitive and yet I understand that every business needs to make money to stay in business and I would recommend Town Fair to anyone looking for good value, fair prices and outstanding service.
